snippet: Martin O’Neill, who last coached Sunderland, was hired as Ireland’s coach and will have the former Manchester United captain Roy Keane as his assistant.
abstract: Martin O’Neill, who last coached Sunderland, is hired as Ireland’s soccer coach and will have the former Manchester United captain Roy Keane as his assistant.
lead_paragraph: Martin O’Neill, who last coached Sunderland, was hired as Ireland’s coach and will have the former Manchester United captain Roy Keane as his assistant.
